title: ZOE, KATARINA, ZED OR RYZE
body: I am trying to find out what champs should i master on mid and I have to choose some of those champs what do u guys thik is the best one out of this 4

replies.body:
never play zoe
Stay away from the cancer
All of these decisions are garbo in season 8. Pick someone like Ahri or Kassawin

Zoe: (I main her so I suggest you her) If you like to be hated, there u go, if you like to not be picked/banned a lot of times, there u go, if u like fun champs, there u go
Kat: Idk, she's fun, hard, but fun
Zed: U wont be able to play him at all, only in blind
Ryze: U like reworks or smthing?
Kat is really fun, I never liked Zed plus he's always picked. Ryze isn't good in low elo and imo he's kinda boring. Zoe is fun but people will bully you for playing her.
Im a Mid main, and more specifically a kat main. My opinion would be Kat or Zed, assassins are very reliable when it comes to solo/duo q, and ryze and zoe are kinda not good right now.

All bad decisions in my opinion.
Zoe's the most fun out of all the champs you listed though.
